name: Tire Recovery Ontario
goal:
Under North America's first circular economy framework legislation, Tire Recovery Ontario is one of only two producer responsibility organizations in a regulated diversion market, working on behalf of producers to resource recover tires and related legally-diverted waste streams.

From its unique position as a first producer responsibility organization, TRO can contribute from its experience and learning developments in North America's growing and dynamic waste diversion markets, including in Ontario Canada where producers must privately achieve the certified resource recovery of its products through whatever individual and group measures it may select, resulting in a diversity of approaches and innovations.
